thread.title: GOP leadership election brings power of purse to forefront
thread.title_full: GOP leadership election brings power of purse to forefront

title: GOP leadership election brings power of purse to forefront
text:
GOP leadership election brings power ... GOP leadership election brings power of purse to forefront There are 4 comments on the The Hill story from 8 hrs ago, titled GOP leadership election brings power of purse to forefront . In it, The Hill reports that: 
Taking the initiative and forcing a meeting amongst his House Republican colleagues, Roskam reportedly laid out a vision where Congress reassert its Article One constitutional authority. Reminding his colleagues about the Obama administration's usurpation of the congressional power of the purse and lawmaking power, Roskam set the stage for a robust internal debate amongst contenders for at least three House leadership positions about how they would make Congress more than a red-headed stepchild to the president . Join the discussion below, or Read more at The Hill.
